alert.note: Alert for Henry (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 05 at 8:22PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Henry County through 900 PM CDT... At 822 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Deepwater, or 8 miles southeast of Clinton, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Clinton, Deepwater, Coal, Brownington, Tightwad and Truman Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for west central Missouri.
